query:
-- Get contract details
SELECT id, propertyId, buyerName, contractDate, firstPaymentDueDate, paymentFrequency, monthlyPayment 
FROM contracts 
WHERE id = 210001;

-- Get next pending installment
SELECT id, dueDate, amount, status, paymentType
FROM installments 
WHERE contractId = 210001 AND status = 'PENDING'
ORDER BY dueDate ASC 
LIMIT 1;
